version_description:
- Improved interface
- Fixed bugs

- Improved interface
- Fixed bugs

- Soundsystem improvements, especially regarding the volume of your recordings and the pitch feature
- We've also improved the library's interface to make it more intuitive, hope you'll like it :)
- You can now create your own edjing playlists
- Possibility to save your queue
- Possibility to sort your tracks by duration
- Bug fixes

- Soundsystem improvements, especially regarding the volume of your recordings and the pitch feature
- We've also improved the library's interface to make it more intuitive, hope you'll like it :)
- You can now create your own edjing playlists
- Possibility to save your queue
- Possibility to sort your tracks by duration
- Bug fixes

Big news! edjing Pro is now compatible with Mixfader - the world’s first wireless crossfader (more info on themixfader.com)! Mixfader controls your crossfader, and lets you dive deeper into the art of mixing!
We also fixed several bugs thanks to your feedback, and optimised the performances of the app.

Our team is waiting for your feedback at support.pro@edjing.com :)

What's new inversion 1.3.1?
- bug fixes thanks to your feedback
- app performances optimized
- as a reminder - edjing Pro is compatible with Mixfader - the world’s first wireless crossfader (more info on themixfader.com)! Mixfader controls your crossfader, and lets you dive deeper into the art of mixing!

If you enjoy the app, please take a moment to rate it on the store, it is really helpful for us :)
Thanks in advance!

Thanks for using edjing Pro! For this version, we updated the app for iOS 10.

As the App Store does not let us answer your reviews from here, please write us directly at support.pro@edjing.com, our team is waiting for your feedback :)

If you enjoy the app, please take a moment to rate it on the store, it is really helpful for us!

Thanks in advance!

Hey guys! We know it's been a while since the latest big update, but your waiting time is finally over!

For this version we focused on providing you with better app performances and sound rendering thanks to our brand new and upgraded soundsystem! You will also discover the new Reverb effect, you should enjoy it ;)

And, as good things come in pairs, we also fixed major and annoying crashes:
- issue when using automix in lockscreen mode: fixed
- issue when connecting to deezer: fixed
- crash when sharing to Facebook: fixed
- issue when using Mixfader with edjing pro: fixed

Keep writing us at support.pro@edjing.com, your feedback are everything to us! And if you like edjing Pro, make sure to rate it on the store ;)
